get.description: Get contract logs from the database

parameters.name: startBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are starting

parameters.name: endBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are ending

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Address of the sender, that will be used as a filter

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Address of the receiver, that will be used as a filter

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the logs that will be returned

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the logs that will be returned

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of the logs that will be returned

get.description: Get total transactions and values for all indexed period. Also possible to select specific period by date in timesamp or block number

parameters.name: startBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are starting

parameters.name: endBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are ending

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

200.description: Object with total values for selected or all period

get.description: Get top accounts by total value of transactions. Also possible to select specific period by date in timesamp or block number

parameters.name: startBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are starting

parameters.name: endBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are ending

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the results

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order direction of the results

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order by which the results are ordered

get.description: Directly from blockchain. This endpoint able to get max 1000 logs

parameters.name: startBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are starting

parameters.name: endBlock
parameters.description: Block number from which the logs are ending

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date of the logs. Used timestamp in milliseconds

parameters.name: topicName
parameters.description: Topic name of the logs

executedDate.description: Date when the transaction was executed

uploaded.description: Date when the log was uploaded
